reviewText: Great movies, but the disc's are mixed up, the titles on the disc's are the wrong way round Stardust on That'll be the day and vice versa.. worked it out and still happy.....

I have seen this on tv a few times and had it recorded on vhs from the tv in the early eighties. I have been watching out for a copy of it for quite a while. Funny thing is that if you are not British you propably Don't know who David Essex is?
